Class Action

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.rcktapp.api.Dto

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Rule>

    public class Action
extends Rule
    An Action exists to parameterize the invocation of a Handler and allow the Endpoint to order its list of handlers
